content.rendered:
Congratulations to Grumbo Aerospace, the winners of last weekend’s Wales Regional Heat!  The company was formed of students from Queen Elizabeth’s Hospital School, Bristol and Cardiff Sixth Form College.

All students from the company have won places at the UK Finals to be held at Imperial College London in March 2016.

A big thank you is due to event hosts, Imran Farzal and the team at Cardiff Sixth Form College.  Another big thank you is due to our dedicated volunteers, experienced and new, who helped to make the event possible.

Are you interested in winning a place at the UK Finals to compete with all of the students from the Regional Heats?  Enter our video competition by 2359 on Friday 18 December 2015 to be in with a chance of qualifying to take part.  Good luck!
